query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [Responsible] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DepartmentResponsible] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Supervisor] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Counterparty] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Date] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Days] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Documents] nvarchar(max) NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] citext NOT NULL, [Responsible] citext NULL, [DepartmentResponsible] citext NULL, [Supervisor] citext NULL, [Counterparty] citext NULL, [Date] citext NULL, [Days] citext NULL, [Documents] citext NULL)

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_DocControlReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
